text:
Market-based method quantifies Scope 2 GHG emissions based on GHG emissions
emitted by the generators from which the reporting entity contractually purchases
electricity bundled with instruments, or unbundled instruments on their own (GHG
Protocol, “Scope 2 Guidance”, Glossary, 2015); in this case, the undertaking may disclose
the share of market-based scope 2 GHG emissions linked to purchased electricity
bundled with instruments such as Guarantee of Origins or Renewable Energy Certificates.
